content.summary: A driven, passionate, and adaptable professional with a Bachelor's Degree in Business Administration. Demonstrates strong organizational skills, exceptional communication abilities, and the ability to work independently or as part of a team. Has experience in project management, digital marketing, and human resources. Shows initiative in self-learning and staying up-to-date with industry trends.

experience.title: Event Manager
experience.responsibilities: Handling social media accounts, teaching soft skills to pharma students},

responsibilities.title: HR Executive
responsibilities.responsibilities: Managed customer connections, trained coworkers on LinkedIn usage},

projects.title: Risk and Return analysis of Companies under NSE in FMCG sector
projects.objectives: To provide suggestions to investors about the best-performing companies in the Indian FMCG market.
projects.contributions: Calculated correlation beta and return of top 10 FMCG companies.

certifications: Master of Project Academy - Microsoft Excel Training

candidate_attributes_inferred.initiative_and_self_learning: Demonstrates passion for staying up-to-date with industry trends and seeking new learning opportunities.
candidate_attributes_inferred.teamwork_or_leadership_traits: Has experience in managing teams, overcoming public speaking fears, and leading events.
candidate_attributes_inferred.communication_clarity: Effectively communicates with customers, coworkers, and investors.
